content: From Da Vinci Gaps in Care Connectathon Track work. Interested in using the care-gaps operation with bulk FHIR on care gaps reference implementation which is using a HAPI server Does HAPI support the asynchronous pattern (bulk data) ? see our Implementation Guide specification - here - http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-deqm/gaps-in-care-reporting.html#bulk-data @Yan Heras @Rob Reynolds
@James Agnew Any insight that you can offer us here?
